text: Virginio Bettini (29 June 1942 â€“ 21 September 2020) was an Italian politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament from 1989 to 1994. He was a member of the Green Italy. Bettini died on 21 September 2020, aged 72. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy
